name: Art Line Life by Karrie Ross

metadata.name: Art Line Life by Karrie Ross
metadata.description:
Art Line Life is a collection that includes my artwork from painting, drawing, photography, collage, assemblage, video and anything else i make using as many styles, media and whimsy that is part of me, my being human. 


The images, artwork, example my adventures, journeys, thoughts and actions.  Please do a search for Karrie Ross as I have many other collections and contracts. 


This nft is the logo for the collection, created with a ERC1155 smart contract with 1/1, editions and open editions minted at manifold.xyz snd stored on arweave.


I'm a 73yrs old artist and i create art, the utility is that i can continue to create the more i create and sell. I hope you like my thoughts. With love, thank you.


x x x x x


Ross's distinctive, metaphorical, whimsical narrative, thought-provoking, abstract pieces revolve around the central theme of energy. She believes that the potential to create one's own energy has the power to alter a person's experiences & life circumstances. I dont know how long the following links will survive after me but you can also do an internet search for my name. With love, thank you.


Please let me know if you have questions http://www.karrieross.com


https://linktr.ee/karrieross 


Twitter @karrieross
